name: Nature's Zombie Apocalypse
description: Animals are the heroes in this hilariously quirky zombie shooter. Elephants with miniguns and sloths with flamethrowers are just a few of the crazy combinations available to take on the undead. Gaming with your friends has never been so much fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 2.2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1000 MB available space
